# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(RAGE_database)

INCLUDE(${VISIT_SOURCE_DIR}/CMake/PluginMacros.cmake)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(RAGE)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
RAGEPluginInfo.C
RAGECommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
RAGEPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
RAGEMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtRAGEFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
RAGEEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtRAGEFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF4_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

if(WIN32)
    add_compile_definitions(${HDF4_WIN32_DEFINES})
endif()

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF4_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IRAGEDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IRAGEDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IRAGEDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MRAGEDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MRAGEDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MRAGEDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MRAGEDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(ERAGEDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERAGEDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF4_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ERAGEDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERAGEDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(ERAGEDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(ERAGEDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF4_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(ERAGEDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} ERAGEDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_RTOD(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases RAGE ${INSTALLTARGETS})
